column1: Molly likes animals. She has a cat. She has a dog. She has a bird. She has a hamster. She has a bunny. Her cat's name is @entity2. Her dog's name is @entity4. Her bird's name is @entity3. Her hamster's name is @entity0. Her bunny's name is @entity1. @entity2 plays with yarn. @entity4 plays with a ball. @entity3 plays in her cage. @entity0 runs on his wheel. @entity1 eats carrots.
